WorkItem.Description:
I created a test config file test.chirp.config:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<root xmlns="urn:ChirpyConfig"
      xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
      xsi:schemaLocation="urn:ChirpyConfig http://www.weirdlover.com/chirpy/chirp.xsd">
    <FileGroup Name="test.scripts.js">
        <File Path="jquery-1.4.4.min.js" Minify="false" />
    </FileGroup>
</root>

The file gets minified even if I specify Minify="false". You can see in the attachement.

Comments.Message: This issue is now solved with the new 2.0 release.

In the old version i could specify on the filegroup minify=false and on an individual file minify=true, and it would generate my normal all.js file. now if you specify minify anywhere at all you always get a all.min.js

For example:
<FileGroup Name="all.js" Minify="false">
<File Path="jquery-1.4.4.min.js" Minify="false" />
<File Path="normal.js" Minify="true" />
<File Path="do-some-debugging-here.js" Minify="false" />
</FileGroup>

will output all.min.js file event though i explicitly said the group should not be minified (if i then choose to minify or not an individual file inside the group, that should be my option)


The problem is that i don't want to re-reference all the aspx files to point to *.min.js or *.debug.js each time i want todo some tests, i just want it to point to all.js ..like this when the site is working normally my all.js file contains minified code, but if i need to quickly debug some code, i just toss a version of the all.js file with non minified code on the server to get some traces back (this was working fine in 1.0.5).

We currently have our site loadbalanced across 5 servers, and sometimes i need do live tests on one of them by tossing a debug version of all.js it, and it sends me window.error info via ajax to a healthmonitoring endpoint ..and well, the line info from windo.error doesn't really work well with minified code :)
